channel.title: Solution?
channel.description:
After reading Lethal Snow's introduction topic, i realised some people are not happy with the current situation.
This community always has been and always will be fucked up, as Kane said, it's why we love it.
I took this quote from King Redrum. I don't know if you guys love the way it is , but as Kane said, this community is fucked up. Anyway, i remember back when kaitniek's site was still up and running. I really don't remember much of it, but i do remember i loved the section where people posted ways to change the client so your character could turn into an evil tree. I think the people back then were realy nice. Then kaitnieks shut down and a message saying the site would soon be back appeared. That's when i found MITB. I remember lots of SCAR scripts were posted here, people worked on various projects and this guy(i dont remember his name) made some serious money by selling SCAR scripts. By telling this i hope you guys would remember at how good it was back then and that maybe we could change to how it was. But how? Well, i figured that most people just post random stuff or spam, flame just because they are bored. We should all work on a project that could keep us busy and we could do something productive instead of wasting our time reading threads like "The hardest shit you have had". Now i heard someone say that this is the no.1 runescape cheating community, while all i ever hear here is people complaining about other people. If you want this to be the no.1, you have to do something. It won't happen by itself. Even though i posted stupid shit too and made fun of other people(King Redrum) , i apoligise for that. My question here is: Do you want this to change or leave everything as it is?

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

There is no solutions, there is no point even discussing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

You’re using “we” like you’re speaking for all the people on the forum.
I’m sure there are a few people who would like to have some things changed here
.
I like to do productive things and not waste my time.
It may seem selfish to just come here and start asking people to make changes because i want to do something with my spare time.
But i thought there would be people who think the same like me and would like to do something.

anyway, if anyone is interested in working on some project(non runescape related), contact me.
If anyone is interested in a runescape related project, just post it here.

Thats all i have to say

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:26, topic:253154”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=334437.msg2604032#msg2604032 date=1230430025]

The entire point of change in my view is to fix the power that others have. This forums is ruled by power-hungry tyrants, if we could manage to get someone to actually listen to us for once and we could bring them to understand the problems with the forum (power-wise) and could have it fixed, then MAYBE this forum could begin it’s transformation into a better system.

Then again, all we’re doing is hoping, I won’t say names, but most of the staff on MSCP and MITB are power-hungry bastards, note that I say most, not all. Some are pretty cool.

I’m just going to say what everyone else is thinking.
If you don’t like it, get out. You only came to the forum like, one day ago? And already you’re trying to change it. We’ve all been here a lot longer, and we don’t want change. It’s not your forum to try and help.
[/quote]
Watch out for tico’s anti-elitism detector[/quote]
I can hear a distant beeping.

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

I’m not saying to change to user base, i’m saying the people here could do something productive once in a while instead of being lazy and doing the same damn thing every day.

*check new replies to your posts.
*reply something stupid
*Leave the forum

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

To change this community you will need to change the user base, the type of people it attracts. You can’t change that, so you can’t change the community.

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:15, topic:253154”][quote author=Ske link=topic=334437.msg2603958#msg2603958 date=1230426494]

This is like the tenth topic about this.

Was about to say.

Heaps of people try to make change, but it will never happen.

Probably because everyone reads these threads and they also reply, but nobody actualy participates into making some changes around here.
[/quote]
That’s because no-one cares or could be fucked too. Define change- How far is your expectation of change within the community? And what’s the outcome?

Everyone might find the community boring, then. It’s basically why everyone comes here; to express opinion, flame, laugh.[/quote]

True enough, which a lot of people understand I’m sure, but with this there needs to be some sort of bloody intelligence, which as of right now, (and don’t take it as if I’m calling you, Kane, or anyone else idiots or that you are not intelligent, that is not my meaning) seems that there is none. If people could remain mature and bare a sense of intelligence, while at the same time, having a good laugh and voicing their opinions, it would be better off I believe.

Newer members could join and instead of running away as soon as they see one of our threads, they too would join in and laugh. As it is now, every new member we receive, is chased off and flamed until they leave besides those who have enough balls to weather it, which is very few.

Read full topic

Everyone might find the community boring, then. It’s basically why everyone comes here; to express opinion, flame, laugh.

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:12, topic:253154”][quote author=King Redrum link=topic=334437.msg2603967#msg2603967 date=1230426756]
But will they, nohope?

The administrators here admit that the forums are fucked up, but the question is, WILL they do something to fix it? Certain mods may try to do what they can to fix it, as will other non-staff and ex-staff, but the only way these forums can truly change is if everyone can put their differences aside and work together.
[/quote]

And then the Barny song plays?[/quote]

You could play “The Wheels on the Bus” for all I care, just so long as the community changes for the betterment, in a sense. Then again, as you said, you like it and some others do too, but also scares away newer members, who can’t handle the shit that this forum gathers day after day.

Meaning eventually, it will only be those who were previously here, which means nothing new can be taught, meaning that in the end, MITB was as pointless as a condom with a hole in it.

That’s just my two cents worth, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Solution?
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

@Ske, we had our arguments, everyone dose and I apologize also for the foolish way I acted.

This community is fucked up, but being honest with this, I don’t know if it can be saved.

I noticed the Project Notebook thread, it seemed that community projected failed as well, now, I may be new to these parts and people don’t even fucking know me, but I’d like to do what I can to help make it better, if it can still be saved.

@the bank, there could be a hundred of these posted, but it only requires one of them to actually get everyone’s attention and hope that it’ll work unlike the last 99 of them.

Read full topic
